docs.lead_paragraph: More than one-eighth of all school children in New York are undernourished, and one-quarter of them are in need of medical care, according to Department of Health Inspectors who have just completed a thorough examination of the children in all the schools.

headline.main: UNDERFED CHILDREN PROBLEM IN SCHOOLS; Dr. Emerson Says One-eighth of the Pupils Also Need Medical Care. SEES A SERIOUS MENACE Increase in Cases of Tuberculosis Is Attributed Almost Entirely to Malnutrition.
